readingMnemonic:
The reading is all on'yomi, and you know how to read 風. You didn't learn 涼's on'yomi (りょう) with the kanji though, so here's a mnemonic to help:

Imagine that a <vocabulary>cool breeze</vocabulary> is pushing your little <reading>row</reading> (りょう) boat along, so that you don't need to do any rowing. Ahh, what a nice cool breeze…
